SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package controller

Interface AppointmentOutcomeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentOutcomeController
public interface AppointmentOutcomeService
Interface for managing appointment outcomes. Defines the contract for operations related to appointment outcomes, including creation, retrieval, and updating of appointment outcomes.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • createAppointmentOutcome

      void createAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId) throws IOException
      Creates a new appointment outcome for a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment for which the outcome is being created.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • viewAppointmentOutcomes

      void viewAppointmentOutcomes() throws IOException
      Retrieves and displays all appointment outcomes.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • getAllAppointmentOutcomesForPatient

      void getAllAppointmentOutcomesForPatient(String patientId) throws IOException
      Retrieves and displays all appointment outcomes for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient whose appointment outcomes are to be retrieved.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • displayPendingAppointmentOutcomes

      void displayPendingAppointmentOutcomes() throws IOException
      Displays all appointment outcomes with a "Pending" medication status.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • changePrescriptionStatusToDispensed

      void changePrescriptionStatusToDispensed(String outcomeId) throws IOException
      Updates the prescription status of a specific appointment outcome to "Dispensed".
      Parameters:
      outcomeId - the ID of the appointment outcome to update.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • isValidMedication

      String isValidMedication(String medicationName) throws IOException
      Validates a medication name against the medication inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the name of the medication to validate.
      Returns:
      the exact medication name if it exists in the inventory, or null otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • generateNextAppointmentOutcomeId

      String generateNextAppointmentOutcomeId() throws IOException
      Generates the next appointment outcome ID in sequence.
      Returns:
      the generated appointment outcome ID.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.
